title: Short orders against Tesla (TSLA) reach $1 billion – S3 Partners
text: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) posted its biggest single-day gain since January in yesterday's session on July 21, as shares ended the.

title: Mexican region gives Tesla and its suppliers a dedicated border crossing lane
text: Tesla suppliers traveling from Nuevo León, Mexico, to Texas now have their very own dedicated border patrol lane.

title: Markets Mostly Up; Snap Crashes -24% on Weak Q2
text: SNAP is getting crushed after hours on top- and bottom-line misses and pulled guidance.

title: Elon Musk's Tesla shares could be targeted by Delaware courts in Twitter case
text: A Delaware judge looks increasingly likely to order Elon Musk to go through with his $44 billion deal to buy Twitter — and if she does and if Musk resists, experts say the court has more power to force a deal than many investors realize.  Legal experts say Delaware Court of Chancery judge Kathaleen McCormick.

title: A top Tesla executive reportedly faces scrutiny over the purchase of materials he said were for a special project — and its potential ties to Elon Musk are being investigated
text: Bloomberg reported that several Tesla employees have already been terminated as a result of the purchase, which included a special kind of glass.

title: US stocks rise as Tesla continues to climb while energy prices and bond yields drop
text: US stocks ended the day higher as electric car maker Tesla surged 10% after reporting strong second-quarter earnings.

title: Analysis-'Unknowns' delay Tesla's ramp-up of its own cutting-edge batteries
text: Tesla Inc is falling short of CEO Elon Musk's target to make its own next-generation batteries, sparking questions over the top electric car maker's ability to maintain its blistering expansion of auto production next year and beyond.

title: Investors betting against Tesla could be headed for 'short squeeze hell' after the EV maker's 2nd-quarter earnings
text: Tesla's short interest currently stands at a notional value of $18.5 billion, according to S3 Partners.

title: Analysts, Options Traders React to Tesla's Earnings Beat
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) took a trip to the earnings confessional after yesterday's close, and was last seen up 7.3% at $796.76 following the results.

title: Tesla shares jump on second-quarter report that was better than analysts feared
text: Shares of Tesla jumped more than 7% on Thursday after the electric car maker released second-quarter results that were better than analysts feared.

title: Why Will Highly-Valued Tesla Move Higher? Results
text: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) reported a mixed quarter but the shares are moving higher anyway. The shares are moving higher because, although mixed, the margin came in well above the consensus estimate despite headwinds that cut into both the top line and margins.

title: Tesla Mixed Q2 Earnings Put These ETFs in Focus
text: Tesla Motors reported mixed Q2 earnings, beating estimates for earnings but lagging on revenues. The electric carmaker also ended its streak of record quarterly profits.

title: Why Tesla Stock Is Gaining Ground Today
text: Strong second-quarter results sent shares higher.

title: Tesla Revenue Grows, Sells Bitcoin
text: Tesla (TSLA) shares climbed 2% in pre-market trading after the electric vehicle company reported its revenue grew 42%, though its margins have declined.

title: US stocks trade mixed as strong Tesla earnings lift Nasdaq while ECB hikes rates for first time in 11 years
text: Russia resumed gas flows via its key Nord Stream 1 pipeline, although at reduced flows, sending natural gas prices down and the euro up.

title: Tesla shares climb after car maker got ‘tough quarter' out of the way, and as Wall Street eyes production ramp ups
text: Wall Street analysts expressed some relief that Tesla Inc. reported second-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street estimates despite tough market conditions, with results boosted by vehicle price increases and the company's decision to sell most of its bitcoin.

title: Tesla Stock Not A Buy Despite 42% Revenue Growth
text: Tesla lacks sufficient Bitcoin to fuel its factory cash burn. Meanwhile, mastering its supply chain problems and its inability to raise prices enough to cover rising costs raise concerns about further margin compression.

title: Nasdaq futures fight to stay positive with upbeat Tesla results
text: Nasdaq futures eked out gains on Thursday as electric automaker Tesla topped Wall Street's profit target, while futures tracking the S&P 500 and the Dow struggled for direction ahead of more earnings reports.

title: Tesla's Profit Soars -- and More Strong Growth Is On the Way
text: A war chest of cash and attractive reinvestment opportunities combine to make Tesla stock quite attractive.

title: 3 Bargain Stocks Cathie Wood Loves
text: Investors can use the tech sector's current weakness as an entry point to capitalize on big-picture trends.

title: Tesla Beats Earnings Estimates Again. But Did It Change Many Minds on Wall Street?
text: Tesla's second-quarter adjusted earnings of $2.27 a share topped analysts' expectations. After the report, Wall Street is now having its say.
